title: Gaseous Form
content:
to a tiny gas cloud. It can't fall, and fits through small openings. It is very hard to damage.

The cloud has Advantage on Constitution, Dexterity, and Strength Saving Throws.

While transformed, the target won't be able to attack, cast spells, or talk.

Melee Concentration

Gaseous Form is a Spell in Baldur's Gate 3. Gaseous Form is a Lvl 3 Spell from the Transmutation school. Spells can be used for dealing damage to Enemies, inflict Status Ailments, buff Characters or interact with the enviro
